description: Try our easy to follow Pork Loin Cutlets with Pear & Fennel Braise recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pork Loin Cutlets with Pear & Fennel Braise
name: Pork Loin Cutlets with Pear & Fennel Braise Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove pork from oven and stir any juices into fennel mixture. Spoon onto plates and top with pork to serve.
